definition: variant of 訓誡|训诫[xun4 jie4]
to guard against/to exhort/to admonish or warn/to give up or stop doing sth/Buddhist monastic discipline/ring (for a finger)

sentences.english: a good example is the best sermon.
sentences.chinese: 傑出的典範是最佳的訓戒。

sentences.english: He began to laugh at his grandfather's warning against blowing his horn.
sentences.chinese: 他開始嘲笑他祖父不要他吹喇叭的訓戒。

sentences.english: And yet this was the message the enemies of Christ now threatened to destroy.
sentences.chinese: 可這是基督的敵人威脅要毀掉的訓戒。
